thread.title: Texas School Shooting Victims Remembered at Church Service

author: Erin Ailworth
title: Texas School Shooting Victims Remembered at Church Service

organizations.name: texas school shooting victims remembered at church service

text:
SANTA FE, Texas—Members of Arcadia First Baptist Church in Santa Fe, just down the road from the site of Friday’s deadly high-school shooting, shook hands and received hugs and words of comfort from Gov. Greg Abbott before the start of Sunday services.
“I’m here to comfort my fellow Texans,” Mr. Abbott said.
The service focused on healing... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
